caption: Figure 1: Sensitivity of KeyNMF to the choice of N keywords on multiple metrics and news sources.
description: The chart displays the sensitivity of KeyNMF's performance to the number of keywords used across multiple metrics and news sources.

caption: Figure 2: The total and unique number of articles collected for each news site.
description: The bar chart displays the total and unique number of articles collected from five different Chinese diaspora news sites.
